title: Trent Telford of Covata Addresses Data Security at Cyber Security Summit NYC
text:
Submitted by admin on 9/17/2015 @ 1:59 PM Companies mentioned in this article: Covata 
NEW YORK -- (BUSINESS WIRE) -- Cyber security and global business expert Trent Telford will be speaking to senior executives on the benefits of implementing a data centric approach to security at the Cyber Security Summit in New York City. 
When: Friday, September 18, 2015 at 1:00pm ET 
Where: Millennium Broadway Hotel (145 West 44 th Street), New York, NY 10036 
Topic: Implementing a Data Centric Approach to Security 
Synopsis: As attacks continue to plague organizations across every industry, it is abundantly clear that old security methods are not working. Organizations need to take a new, data-centric approach to protecting sensitive information. Central to this is easy and transparent encryption, verifiable identification and policy controls. A data centric approach must remove the burden of security from the business, make it intrinsic to the way organizations operate and subsequently enhance productivity. Businesses must have the tools to operate securely especially when virtually every employee and business partner can land in an attacker’s sight. In this session, Telford will discuss how to deploy a new data centric approach to cyber security and the positive impact it can have on an organization’s productivity and protection. 
Additional Details: www.cybersummitUSA.com
